website_summaries.verdict: The wireless Sony MDR-XB950B1 headphones deliver as much bass thump as any pair we've tested, and because of that never sound quite balanced.
pros: Can be used in passive, wired mode
cons: Added bass can sound comically heavy

customer_reviews.title: SONY hits once again with quality,sound and price!!
customer_reviews.text: SONY hasn't disappointed me, as always! These headphones are absolutely amazing! I have tried many models and I got this after having the wired sisters MDR-XB950 for over 2 years. I wasn't sure if it was worth to switch to Bluetooth due to battery life (for the headphones and the device), sound quality and strength of the item, but OMG! And the Bass Boost mode is indescribable! If you love bass, these are for you and definitely worth the price! Same light and resistant quality of the previous models and if you run out of battery you'll only have to plug in the provided wire and carry on listening to your tracks!! LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.author: Maz

customer_reviews.title: Deep bassy headphones, light, maybe just a bit too fragile
customer_reviews.text: I think it doesn't get enough love. It's a great pair of headphones, nothing annoying. Maybe my only complaint is that it feels a bit fragiley constructed, a little more plastic than I would hope for - but so long as you take good care it should be fine. They are however light, lighter than its noise cancelling version that I've tried. But the sound is wonderful and for any bassheads, it's just perfect. Battery lasts a good long time, too.
customer_reviews.author: swedishfish

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, terrible build quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace a pair of MDR-XB950BTs I sent back under warranty after the plastic snapped for no apparent reason. Although these MDR-XB950B1s offer great overall sound quality with incredible bass and are comfortable to wear, I cannot give them more than three stars because the same issue occurred with them. After only a few months of ownership, cracks started appearing in the plastic. Turns out this is a very common problem with Sony’s MDR headphone range.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Shale-Hester

customer_reviews.title: I expected it to be a bit more louder
customer_reviews.text: - You cannot dance with them on - You'll sweat with them after wearing it for nearly an hour - It can crackle if it faces connection issues and then you may find yourself disconnecting and reconnecting it - It is fast connecting - The bass is really good - It last for hours, I can it for 4 days and it is low on the 4th day - Control buttons are easy to access - It isn't uncomfortable and the padding is good for a certain amount of time - It adjust to your head
customer_reviews.author: Nice

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 3 months - Sony utterly frustrating
customer_reviews.text: These have a very flimsy connection between the earpiece and the headband and broke within 3 months of purchase. I returned them to Sony but Sony would not honour the guarantee and wanted to charge £70 to fix them. As I’d only paid £100 I thought this was way too much. Their customer complaints system was utterly frustrating, and verging on non-existent, with subsequent people simply reciting the same line to me that there was ‘nothing’ they could do. Outrageously, they even wanted to charge me £28 to return them broken! I was very surprised that a company the size of Sony would have such shoddy customer service. I will avoid buying Sony in future.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Excellent build and sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I tried a few different headphones before settling for these (some were higher price). The music I listen to is mainly hip hop so the bass is important to me and these headphones certainly didn't let me down on that front. The fact you can have the bass boosted or normal is also a great feature. They are well made and sit comfortably over the ear with no sound leakage. Bluetooth connects instantly and the battery life is excellent. The only downside is that you don't get a case or protective pouch so you have to buy one of these separately (this is a must when buying headphones)
customer_reviews.author: mattywsc

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly and I have a large head (had sone beats headphones and they were a tight fit) great sound quality amazing battery life ( used a few hours a day and not had to re charge them in two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: ISL

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, but headband uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking headphones with excellent sound & amazingly deep (but not overwhelming) BASS. Good clamping on ears but I found padding below shiny metal headband very thin. Eventually, weight of headphones squashed padding too thin & caused discomfort on top of my head. Regrettably sent back & ordered Bose Soundports-50% lighter & being Bose, 50% more expensive! Lack the headbanging bass of the Sonys, but perfect overall sound stage for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones but the warranty does not cover physical damage.
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, reasonable build quality, refined sound. These were only 4 months old when one end snapped off. They are repairable, but only for a charge as the Sony warranty does not cover physical damage apparently. No-one has even asked how they were damaged, just a flat 'no'. I have given three stars as a result.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: ultra high sound quality. a must buy :)
customer_reviews.text: I had the corded model of these , and decided to get the wireless as well because the sound was so great, go easy with them they are very delicate ,Ive put black insulating tape around the swivel connectors if you don't mind them fixed , will last much longer. otherwise the best headphones on the market, 5stars
customer_reviews.author: loading please wait......

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: Value for money and does what is says in the tin. I use them predominately for listening to audio books and they fit the bill perfectly. For music it’s okay but nothing to get excited about. Ease of use - very easy and intuitive. Phone calls - again easy to use and clear. Would I recommend the headset? Yes I most definitely would.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised and extremely impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound quality - the best Bluetooth over ear headset I've owned so far. Extremely light and comfortable. The earcups are super soft and I can imagine they will be comfy even for people who wear glasses - pressure on my ears or my head whatsoever. It's a bit of a "boxception" situation to unpack but don't give up - the headphones are in the 3rd box! 😂😂😂😂
customer_reviews.author: Nadezhda Hlebarova

customer_reviews.title: Amazing qaulity , Basshead's dream
customer_reviews.text: These are still my favourite pair of headphones this was supposed to be a pair for my friend but they were broken on arrival Which is no ones fault but still everytime I put these headphones on I'm blown away by the qaulity and I highly highly recommend these for bass lovers as they are the best bass headphones you can buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phones for your head, would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great quality headphones, wireless connection is easy to set up and just about loud enough. Note they are not noise cancelling. Slightly on the heavy side but then again I do have a weak neck (I trapped it in a door when I was young but that's a story for another day). Sound quality is good, be careful on the extra bass, the first time I switched it on while listening to some badass gangsta rap it set my bowels off and I almost filled my trollies with shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Mr D A Conway

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Theses are a great pair of headphones they sound very good are extremely comfortable and give a great clear bass. The buttons are nice to touch. They pair easily especially if you use nfc the connection is great and has a good range. They work well with the app, allowing you to adjust the level of the bass. So a really great pair of headphones
customer_reviews.author: Michael Account

customer_reviews.title: And good and bad
customer_reviews.text: Comparing with Beats. After you want Beats. Sony is also great, bun sound is no deep at all. Yeah, amazing bass, but music is not about bass only. There is a lot of instruments. And another thing is. I wanted to return them because Microphone is Hell. Very Very bad Microphone. Home acceptable when is quite. But in street or metro, you can not talk on the phone trough the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Dumitru

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for good sound quality these are very very good everyone at work that put them on said some of the best headphones they've heard, didn't feel flimsy for me I take them to gym all the time and I've never adjusted them with the thought that they'd break you don't get that feeling, although did go for the 2 year insurance to make sure, would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Alex Pallent

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift for my brother and wow was i shocked when i tried them out. They are very similar to the Sony MDR-XB950AP, and the fact that you can alternate between wired and Bluetooth makes these headphones really convenient. Sound quality is good, and the bass is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Leon Piponides

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Superb sound and comfort, but the swivel joint for the cans is so flimsy. Two pairs, both have broken.
customer_reviews.author: hgtcamera

customer_reviews.title: great headphones, good for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are one of the best headphones I've used. Sound quality is amazing, noise cancellation is impressive and the battery lasts a long time. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Aashay Shah

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, shame about the build quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones as I have the wired version already and enjoyed them, but wanted something wireless. Arrived and was impressed, although disappointed with the overall quality as there is more plastic than on the wired version. After a week of using them the left earcup snapped off the headband, and I had just taken them off, so nothing outside the normal use.
customer_reviews.author: A. White

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound! Really comfy ear cups. Bluetooth connectivity and range is pretty great with dropping being a rarity. I am worried about the swivel on the ears but other than that the build quality is suoerb. Love them to bits
customer_reviews.author: Scott Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This is a brilliant product. I know it’s been out for some out now but the quality is great, the sound is brilliant. The fit is also very good. My only negative (and this is nothing to do with Sony or the headphones) is that sometimes I would like them to go a bit louder. But again, this is not down to the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Antony Corrigan

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound but hinges keep giving out
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Sound and battery life but terrible build quality due to the hinges continuously failing after height to re purchase as the repairs were astronomical pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Ben L.

customer_reviews.title: Fragile sceleton
customer_reviews.text: Too fragile , the plastic structure cracked after i weared them 6 times. Had to bin them as could not glue
customer_reviews.author: Dilyana Vasileva

customer_reviews.title: Keep a head with these phones.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality very good. Still good with flat battery. Battery life average. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: COL

customer_reviews.title: Really good, pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Look fantastic, great options in the app and a nice punchy bass. Just a small amount of distortion at times depending on genre of music.
customer_reviews.author: Si

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing for the price, i really don’t have any complaints. Out of all the headphones i’ve had that have cost 3x more these are still the best in almost all aspects! (These headphones do not come with noise cancelling if you’re wondering)
customer_reviews.author: Julian carter

customer_reviews.title: Broke again!
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 4 months. Second pair i got, and once again broke without proper reason. Its sad because i do like the bass in these but i am not going to be buying anymore song headphones. For the price, it is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: esther

customer_reviews.title: Value/Quality KING
customer_reviews.text: This headphone has an amazing sound quality I bought this one for a present I have a previous version , this one is slightly better and can have eq control over the phone. The battery life is amazing in normal usage easily can stretch over 20 hours after a year usage. I use it for my phone, MacBook , PS4 only with cable. Definitely buy it again :) (bought 2 time already)
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P.

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Dont have active noise cancellations but you could buy the N1's if you wanted that. For me they are ideal, mad bass and the app lets you control the bass to suit what music you're listening too. Better than most beats and banging value, hella comfortable too. with all that padding.
customer_reviews.author: Rayaan Hussain

customer_reviews.title: DOPE!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! The sound is just a dream and worth all the money that is spent on them. This is highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MegaCity - GWINEG

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound Quaility
customer_reviews.text: Very good Headphones. Battery lasts well; still on full charge after 9 * 25mins use (walk to work), App is only really needed to check the battery level. Misses brought the next model up with Noise cancelling Tech.. Impressed Sony ! No 5 star as always room for improvment :)
customer_reviews.author: Symon P.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them and so do I because I do t have to listen to the ts ts ts which can sometimes escape. The battery lasts a good few days and is quick to charge
customer_reviews.author: J.Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace my sennheisers and absolutely love them. Great sound quality and handy controls on the side. Also they are over ear which is great.
customer_reviews.author: PixiePerrett

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sound reproduction
customer_reviews.text: I suggest trying on before you buy as the ear cup size is not over generous
customer_reviews.author: brigg

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Such a bad experience with these heaphones. They broke within 2months and didn't get any reasonable support. Head just gone off and became loose. Very dsappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for running.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality and really light so don’t feel them when wearing too much.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Lots of bass
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones i have ever had with so much bass
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Surpassed my expectations
customer_reviews.text: The design looks nice and is confortable. The extra bass is a bonus. It is not too over powering where you can't hear the rest of the music, which is good. I bought a case as well, I reccomemd to do so they don't get damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Yanchuk

customer_reviews.title: Bassheads would love these
customer_reviews.text: If you love bass, this headset is for you. Absolutely amazing sound and bass quality
customer_reviews.author: Robert Popowski

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t pass the Test of Time
customer_reviews.text: The noise cancellation , sound quality & Battery life is superb. But the overall build is terrible, it’s just not built to last and it’s too heavy. The product lasted for just over a year so I can’t even get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is very very good, oh my the sound is so much better than other's in the same price range. Well chuffed
customer_reviews.author: Andy Ridley

customer_reviews.title: Bassssss
customer_reviews.text: Yooooo awesome and the app u can download for it gives you choices of club, arena etc the bass makes me feel like I'm at the concert loving them disowned my beats Sony rockz
customer_reviews.author: stephen fenton

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality, comfortable headphones
customer_reviews.text: amazing, i love them! Bluetooth connection stronger than i expected, headphones stay connected even if im 3 floors away from my phone
customer_reviews.author: Anna Cicely Buck

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Overall good sound quality and attractive headphones. Unfortunately the build quality is poor as the ear peice has broken off.
customer_reviews.author: Zeshan

customer_reviews.title: Good structure and awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: I hoped for a higher volume level, but the quality and the base are amazing. This headphone doesn't work as you would expect on gaming; they are mainly for music.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Ihmoud

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love the different settings, really practical, AMAZING battery life, only downside is that they are a little fragile so take good care of them!
customer_reviews.author: Felicity

customer_reviews.title: Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are great, fantastic sound, stylish and the noise cancelling technology works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: T wilson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: If you're a bass lover , blindly go for this. Bass effect is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Arvindhan

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love them that's it I just really like the quality of sound and construction. I am really satisfied with the confort and battery life!!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Clark

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Heavy bass. Very comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality and amazing bass. I travel a lot and I have been wearing these for 7 hours at a time, and still no discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: MattyRoberts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feel great. Sound great. And comfy to wear for hours on end. 👌
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: tinny sound when loud
customer_reviews.text: when volume increased, the sound distorts quite badly - not acceptable for the price
customer_reviews.author: Graeme

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, nice bass, but they feel a bit weak though
customer_reviews.text: Screw on the head strap on the left side came off at some point, and it’s tiny so I can’t find it, but good headphones otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cordless
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift, daughter very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars all round👍 can’t say much more about this product than go and buy them
customer_reviews.author: Mark Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Solid pair of headphones, very comfortable and sound quality is better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best headphones i have ever had i always had beats ...
customer_reviews.text: best headphones i have ever had i always had beats branding befor but i am now converted highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not loud
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality, sound good but really not very loud!
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Allen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and quality. It fits around the ear nicely
customer_reviews.author: hsuastegui

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love them best pair of headphones i have ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: callum lazenby

customer_reviews.title: It does not work after a week
customer_reviews.text: I used them for a week and they stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choice this was, a very happy child I have
customer_reviews.author: K Lima

customer_reviews.title: Disapointing
customer_reviews.text: Slightly disappointed with these constant dropouts from the Bluetooth, the bass control is a pointless feature as is the app for it......blown out bass....had to turn off, irritating boom......ill stick with my sony ps4 wireless headphones......love these and only £50 when they were on offer, sadly not to be and had to be returned sue to the signal dropouts
customer_reviews.author: P. Baines

customer_reviews.title: Poor build it quality!
customer_reviews.text: Coming up to my third month of having these headphones, both of the swivels on the drivers had, I am very disappointed in the build quality for £100 headphones. A refund or replacement would be a suitable action to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good headphone decent bass
customer_reviews.text: Good headphone decent bass. Not great for gym/ running.. will fall off also will make your ears sweaty. Sound is good nice bass, decent enough miss and highs. Separation of audio is ok not the greatest but you pay for the company name
customer_reviews.author: Ismail

customer_reviews.title: Sony sound and great for listening to movies
customer_reviews.text: Is a typical Sony sound and is good just I thought they’d be a little cleaner in sound, still great but ...
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A. D. Stoneman

customer_reviews.title: broken
customer_reviews.text: received this item opened it up & seemed to be already used as the ear swivel was broken! didnt get the chnace to even test the sound, battery, comfort or generally use it as the earpiece was wobbly so sent it back asap.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Crabb

customer_reviews.title: Honest review
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ear comfort, bass boost on point and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ancel

customer_reviews.title: Sony MDT 950B1 wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with these headphones, i had read the reviews on these headphones watched YouTube clips for about a week for I decided what headphones to buy got theses headphones on a next day delivery on trying them out I found sound quality to be poor and not any better when hard wired I think even one star is to much for these headphones, Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.author: STEPHEN WHITE

customer_reviews.title: why one star Bluetooth is there selling point and xtra bass. The phones connected ok however they would disconnect severa time
customer_reviews.text: Poor Bluetooth why one star Bluetooth is there selling point and extra bass. The phones connected ok however they would disconnect several times the bass is so weak the build quality is ok I could never recommend this
customer_reviews.author: YUBABA

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones for anything
customer_reviews.text: Few years on with these and they have been spectacular. Havent had a problem with them
customer_reviews.author: Jack

product_meta.title: Sony MDR-XB950B1 Wireless Extrabass Headphones - Black
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:BlackDesigned to sound good, look good, and feel good. Explore your favourite tracks in new depth with EXTRA BASS , and listen wirelessly over Bluetooth® for up to 18 hours. EXTRA BASS enhances all your low-end frequencies for deep power on every track. Furthermore, the new Sony Headphones Connect app lets you adjust your bass levels and gives you presents for outdoor-stage, club, hall, or arena style sound so you can customize them to your listening preferences. Link them up wirelessly with your music player, smartphone, tablet or dock. With Bluetooth, you can listen to your latest tracks without having to worry about cables. Lastly, these dance ready headphones sport a headband with a soft head cushion, and around-the-ear pads for all day, all night listening. You’ll enjoy a snug, comfortable fit, wherever your music takes you. Available in black.

BOX CONTAINS
Sony MDR-XB950B1 Wireless EXTRABASS Headphones
Connection Cable
USB Cable
Quick Start Guide
feature_bullets: Extra Bass enhances all your low-end frequencies for deep power on every track; just touch the button to get started
High quality wireless audio with Bluetooth
Optimize your sound setting with Sony headphones connect app
Up to 18 hours of battery life; features volume control

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
